Version 2.0.73 - Persistent Resume Correction via localStorage

Bug Fixes

  • Fix content loading at current slide instead of furthest on refresh/new tab
  • sessionStorage is tab-scoped and lost on refresh; localStorage persists across tabs and sessions
  • furthestSlide now known before SCORM API detection, allowing resume correction to fire in time

Changes

  • Read furthestSlide from localStorage as fallback when sessionStorage is empty
  • Save furthestSlide to both sessionStorage and localStorage on every update (7 save points)
  • Resume correction now works on page refresh: content loads at furthest slide, not current

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.72: Score-based resume correction via LMSInitialize wrap and initial retry
  • v2.0.71: Faster initial progress: 200ms retry instead of fixed 1000ms timeout
  • v2.0.70: Early total slides detection before initial progress send
